attributes.action: Use his influence to have the crown prosecution service appeal the wholly inadequate sentence passed on Stephen Gordon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stephen Gordon has been sentenced to a three year supervison order for a vicious and unprovoked attack on an elderly man which left the victim blind in one eye.
This vicious offence merits a sizeable custodial sentence and the Crown Prosection Service should appeal against the current sentence immediately to ensure the offender is punished in a more appropriate manner.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
